      • generatePasswordHash

        public static java.lang.String generatePasswordHash(java.lang.String password)
                                             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                    java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Generate a strong password hash using the PBKDF2 Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        password - The raw password string as supplied by the user
        Returns:
        A string representing the workload, salt and final hash
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If algorithm is not provided in the stdlib
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - If provided key specification is not provided in the stdlib

        Returns:
        A string containing the generated password salt
        Throws:

      • validatePassword

        private static boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String originalPassword,
                                        java.lang.String storedPassword)
                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Helper method that performs a time-constant comparison of two PBDKF2 password hashes
        Parameters:
        originalPassword - The password hash as it is provided by the user
        storedPassword - The password hash as it is stored in the database
        Returns:
        true if the hashes match, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If provided algorithm is not present in stdlib
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - If provided keyspec is invalid or not provided in stdlib
